snippet.title: Black & White Gameplay (PC)
snippet.description:
~Black and White Gameplay~

System Requirements:
Minimum Requirements

    * Windows 95/98/ME/2000
    * 350Mhz Processor
    * 64MB RAM
    * 600MB Hard Drive
    * 8MB Graphics
    * Direct3D
    * Directx 7.0a

Recorded at minimum settings to avoid lag.
